favourite.article: Thank You for this site. I came across this while looking for songs of encouragement, and I have been blessed with the "New Songs" that you have. I believe that the Holy Spirit led me here, thank You Jesus.
Amen hallelujah! My grandmother in the Philippines will surely love this site! Praise God! Thank you brothers and sisters.
Can you send me the link of the audio of this song here. ? tnx amen.

I'm freshly encouraged! I appreciate that on the one hand as we are spending adequate time with the Lord in the morning we enjoy being supplied, strengthened, refreshed, satisfied-fed and watered... Praise the Lord for that! But this morning through this new song I'm reminded that God has a need. We can cooperate with Him by opening up and letting Him in everyday. "Begin the day with God, He needs His people to Be those who love Him best! Get up with this in view. Rise up! Don’t wait! You’ll miss the Son. He needs some to watch and pray. Spend time with Him and let Him in— To your heart so He can have His way."
